Question: This person was named to the DeMolay Hall of Fame, a Masonic youth organization, on June 25, 1993.
Hints: This person's on-air persona was influenced by that of sportscaster Bill Stern.
This person and his radio network stated that the stories in that series, although entertaining, were completely true.
This person's full-length biography, Good Day! The ____ Story, was published in May 2009 by Regnery Publishing.
